Name: Slav or Not
About the game: Slav or Not is a game build around all the slavic people and their culture. You can test your slavic knowledge as well as your skills on hand-eye coordination. Game can be easily playable with either keyboard or mouse with either arrow keys or mouse clicks. Player can expect 4 different game modes, some of them are testing your hand-eye coordination skill against time, some of them testing your memorization skills. We bring fun to your PC as well as increasing skills in real life. Features 4 Game Modes; Slav Or Not Tripoloski Challange Don't touch Babushka Memorize the Slav In some modes, time is your enemy, some of them time is your friend. Use it wisely. If you are slav and wanted to your images in game or have better game mode ideas ? Please contact via e-mail, we will gladly add your ideas!
